verbs.description: Sylvester Stallone [V: is] teaming with MGM to produce a movie about boxer Jack Johnson , who was recently posthumously pardoned by President Donald Trump . The film will launch Stallone ’s Balboa Productions , created to develop film and television projects . Johnson was a dominant boxer and the first African - American heavyweight champion .
